title: Digital Trading Executive with Spanish or Portuguese Bilingual
content:
Established in 1981 with a single store in the Northwest of England, the JD Group is a leading omni-channel retailer of Sports Fashion, Outdoors and Gyms with over 60,000 colleagues and over 3,400 stores across several retail fascias in over 30 markets around the world.
JD Sports Fashion Plc was listed on the London Stock Exchange in 1996 and has been a FTSE100 publicly quoted company since 2019 and continues to grow in the UK and internationally.
We want to be the leading global omnichannel retailer in the sports and outdoor industry. To be a part of this successful company and help us to achieve this you will have the desire to ingrain our strategic goals of being a people-led, innovative and customer-focused organisation which provides operational excellence whilst identifying new areas of growth as part of our day to day objectives.
Role:
Working with the Trading Manager to ensure commercial targets are met, for sales, GPV and EBIT. Creating a trading plan and building relationships with digital channel teams and buying &  merchandising functions.
Responsibilities:
Planning
-Review the website content & customer journey to ensure relevancy across all devices (web, mobile, app)-Constantly review the navigation and structure of all channels, looking for ways to improve visitor/buyer conversion rates.-Review the season's trading, looking for opportunities to drive sales, through new brands and ranges.-Regular website walk-throughs across all devices.-Understand the Retail performance and adjust plans accordingly.-Be aware of what competitors are doing, looking for new trends and developments.-Testing & tracking promotional mechanics Additional support across key trading periods.
Trading
-Review previous weekâ€™s performance and propose and agree actions for the week.-Review daily sales identifying areas of weakness, proposing, and taking action to increase sales and ensuring optimal stock availability atall times.-Tracking, reporting and recommending solutions for slow sellers.-Suggesting markdown and promotional events in line with brand strategy and tracking performance and reporting on successes andmissed opportunities-Working with Merchandising to drive order fulfilment from Digital warehouses.-Working with digital channel teams to ensure campaigns are consistent and successful.-Work with Marketing to support 3rd party brand campaign execution.
Manage
-Manage the key website metrics across each financial period to ensure all targets are met.-Support and share learnings with wider trading & country teams.-Manage the relationship with digital merchandising counterparts.-Support across key brand relationships.
Teamwork
-Establish working relationships with divisional Buying & Merchandiseteams.-Work closely with all Digital functions across Digital Marketingfunctions, Content, Social and Copywriting.-Create strong relationships with Marketing function.
Key Deliverables
-Drive trading to agreed plans.-Implement and apply good practice.-Build skills & development from working with wider trading team.-Build strong relationships with B& M team.-Identify opportunities.-Identify threats and look to resolve.
Requirements:
-Bachelor's degree in Marketing or similar.
-At least 3 years experience in a similar role.
- Availability to live in Alicante.
-English C1.  Spanish or Portuguese Bilingual.
At JD Group we offer a cooperation and mutual respect based environment, including a solid commitment with diversity and equal opportunities. All applicants will be considered as equal no matter their gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, religion, age nor disability status.
In our recruitment processes, we consider your knowledge and skills, as well as your passion to discover, grow and build new ideas.
What do we offer?

Percentage under objectives.
Flexible schedule.
Remote working.
Tax credit (health insurance, restaurant ticket, childcare ticket).
Employee discount.
Development and career plan in an international environment.
Training both in hard skills and soft skills.
Sport facilities in the company headquarters.
Employee Wellness Programs
Corporate Volunteer Programs within the working day.
